definition: Mt Wuyi in Fujian/Wuyishan nature reserve/Wuyishan county level city in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
surname Wu
martial/military
non-Han people, esp. to the East of China/barbarians/to wipe out/to exterminate/to tear down/to raze
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Wuyishan county level city in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian

sentences.english: The supernatural and wonderful Wuyi Mountains was called"the sixteenth fairyland"by Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 武夷山钟灵毓秀，被道教尊奉为“第十六小洞天”。

sentences.english: Wuyishan City is one of the first train of Chinese excellent tour cities.
sentences.chinese: 武夷山市是首批中国优秀旅游城市。

sentences.english: This May Day holiday, my friend and I went to climb the famous Wuyi mountain.
sentences.chinese: 今年五一，我和朋友去闻名遐迩的武夷山玩。

sentences.english: This is precisely the most special characteristic of Wuyi's scenery.
sentences.chinese: 这正是武夷山景色的最大特点。

sentences.english: The best oolong tea is bohea produced in the Wuyi Mountains of Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 最好的乌龙茶是产在福建武夷山的武夷岩茶。

sentences.english: Wuyi Mountains preserve the primary forest ecosystem characteristic of the mid-subtropics.
sentences.chinese: 武夷山保存了典型的中亚热带原生性森林生态系统。

sentences.english: Tourists climb to the top of Wuyi Mountain in Fujian, China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国福建，游客们正在向武夷山顶进发。

sentences.english: is one of the most beautiful places I’ve ever laid my eyes on.
sentences.chinese: 武夷山是我见过的最美丽的自然景点之一。

sentences.english: Fujian is located in its western region, the Wuyi mountains south of the East.
sentences.chinese: 其地处福建西部，武夷山脉东南麓。

sentences.english: The Wuyishan Scenic Area is located in northern Fujian Province, on China's southeastern coast.
sentences.chinese: 武夷山风景区位于中国东南沿海，福建省北部。

sentences.english: There are gods on Wuyi Mountain.
Its main attractions are the Nine-bend Stream and 36 peaks.
sentences.chinese: 武夷山的主要景点是九曲溪和三十六峰。

sentences.english: The Wuyi (Bohea) Mountain in northwest Fujian Province is a mountain noted for its biological diversity.
sentences.chinese: 闽西北的武夷山是一座生物多样性十分丰富的名山。

sentences.english: Bai Yuchan, who was the fifth ancestor of Inner Alchemy of Southern Lineage in Southern Song Dynasty, lived in Wuyi Mountain sometime.
sentences.chinese: 南宋内丹南宗第五代祖师白玉蟾曾经在武夷山生活过。

sentences.english: Wuyi Mountain has sound infrastructure facilities, serving as the key traffic center for North Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 武夷山交通等基础设施完善，是闽北的重要交通中心。
